metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2770 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The Authen::ExternalAuth extension before 0.11 for Best Practical Solutions RT allows remote attackers to obtain a logged-in session via unspecified vectors related to the "URL of a RSS feed of the user."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2770` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

rt4-extension-authenexternalauth - 0.10-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rt-authen-externalauth package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10-2').
